property.name: text
property.value: Authors: Shuhei Emoto, Mai Kimura, Ilge Akkaya

property.name: text
property.value: A model that simulates an intruder-evasion scenario, where two robots estimate the location of a moving intruder object and move away from the estimated intruder. Each robot runs an internal Particle Filter that runs on the collective robot observations and estimates the posterior probability distribution of the intruder position.

property.name: text
property.value: Model motion where the orientation changes at a constant rate and the speed is fixed.

property.name: text
property.value: Number of Perticles used in ParticleFilter (in the distributed version).

property.name: text
property.value: Constraints of speed (used in the distributed version).

property.name: text
property.value: Input values from Central Computation Node. (Array of velocities for all robots.)

property.name: text
property.value: Robot motion depending on the velocity input.

property.name: text
property.value: Model of sensor on the robot. Measuring the distance to the intruder.

property.name: text
property.value: Measuring the current position of this robot.

entity.name: Gaussian
entity.doc: Create a sequence of gaussian random variables

entity.name: CompositeOptimizer
entity.doc: Optimize the objective function provided in the inside composite, subject to constraints and precision/iteration limits

property.name: expression
property.value: {(speedLimit - speed(0))*Pf_speed, (speedLimit - speed(1))*Pf_speed, (speedLimit - speed(2))*Pf_speed, (speedLimit - speed(3))*Pf_speed, (minDistance(0) - minDistanceLimit)*Pf_minDist, (minDistance(1) - minDistanceLimit)*Pf_minDist, (minDistance(2) - minDistanceLimit)*Pf_minDist, (minDistance(3) - minDistanceLimit)*Pf_minDist, (distToTargetLimit - distToTarget(0))*Pf_distToTarget, (distToTargetLimit - distToTarget(1))*Pf_distToTarget, (distToTargetLimit - distToTarget(2))*Pf_distToTarget, (distToTargetLimit - distToTarget(3))*Pf_distToTarget}

entity.name: IterateOverArray
entity.doc: Iterate a contained actor over input arrays

svg.text: Make sure there is a director here!

property.name: legend
property.value: intruder, particles, robot1, robot2, robot3, robot4
